abilities.name: Roaring Resolve
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put 2 damage counters on this Pokémon. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 Fire Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Continuous Blaze Ball
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.
